zh: 他砍掉了橡树的几根树枝。

en: He didn't take an umbrella with him.
He was carrying an umbrella under his arm.
She is picking over a basket of grapes.
zh: 她正在那一筐葡萄里挑挑拣拣。

en: He stood on the edge of the cliff.
He bent down and picked up the ball.
He warmed himself with a pocket heater.
He was accompanied by his girlfriend.
He plays at aerobics just to please his girlfriend.
zh: 他练健身操纯粹是为了讨女朋友欢心。

en: He was dumped by his girlfriend.
He cheated me at cards.
zh: 他打牌时出老千坑了我。

en: He came from behind the curtain.
He came out from behind the curtain.
zh: 他从帘子后面钻了出来。

en: He gave a flat refusal to his mother's request.
zh: 他一口回绝了妈妈的要求。

en: He looks unhappy because he was scolded by his mother.
zh: 他挨了妈妈的训，看起来不高兴。

en: He had no time when his mother told him to work.
zh: 他妈让他干活时，他说他没空。

en: He gave me this in return.
zh: 他给了我这个作为回礼。

en: On top of everything else, he added that he was hungry.
zh: 最后，他还补了一句说他饿了。

en: He likes to sing in the bathtub.
He is taller than his father.
He has lost his father's watch.
zh: 他把他爸的手表弄丢了。

en: He looks like his father.
He resembles his father very closely.
zh: 他跟他爸长得简直一模一样。

en: He is not ashamed of his father being poor.
zh: 他并不觉得他爸穷有什么丢人的。

en: He robbed an old lady.
He likes to boast about his father's successful automobile business.
zh: 他喜欢吹嘘他爸成功的汽车生意。

en: He brought back several souvenirs.
He held off paying for the television set until the dealer fixed it.
zh: 在卖家修好电视之前，他一直扣着钱没付。

en: He is easily flattered.
He drank a cup of tea and then asked for another.
zh: 他喝了一杯茶，接着又要了一杯。

en: He put milk into his tea and stirred it.
zh: 他往茶里加了牛奶，搅了搅。

en: He is no less kind than his sister.
They smiled at each other.
He is no less smart than his brother.
He was so rich that he could buy any painting he took a fancy to.
zh: 他很有钱，看上哪幅画都能买下来。

en: He is far from rich.
He is rich, and, what is better, very kind.
zh: 他很有钱，更难得的是，他心肠还特别好。

en: Because he was wealthy, he was able to go there.
zh: 因为有钱，他才能去那儿。

en: He has money enough and to spare.
Because of his habit of wasting money, he couldn't get married.
zh: 因为他大手大脚惯了，所以一直没结成婚。

en: He promised to repay the money, but I doubt his word.
zh: 他答应还钱，但我不太信他。

en: I presume that he has paid the money back.
zh: 我想他应该已经把钱还了。

en: I think that he repaid the money.
He left the restaurant without paying.
He was arrested because he stole the money.
He was punished for stealing the money.
He denied having stolen the money.
He bolted away with all money.
zh: 他卷着所有的钱跑路了。

en: He borrowed the money in advance.
He has a little money.
He won a sum of money, and not such a small one, either.
zh: 他赢了一笔钱，而且还不少。

en: He has no money.
He ran out of money.
He asked for money.
He shut up the money in the safe.
He has money, but he's not happy.
Even though he has money, he isn't happy.
zh: 尽管他有钱，但他并不快乐。

en: How much money does he have?
How much money does he possess?
He is free from money worry.
He works for the sake of money.
He was hard up.
He is in need of money.
He was hard up for money and lifted goods in a supermarket yesterday.
zh: 他因为缺钱，昨天在超市偷了东西。

en: He is quite indifferent to money.
He received a ticket in return for the money.
He compensated me for the accident with money.
zh: 他因为那次事故赔了我钱。

en: He said that he wanted some money.
He is in want of money.
He had no money and so could not buy any food.
zh: 他没钱，所以没法买吃的。

en: He killed the goose, foolishly.
He had no money.
He took part in the Olympic Games.
He went to the store to buy some oranges.
He was absent for a matter of ten days.
He gave me a toy box.
He hid his toys under the bed.
zh: 他把玩具藏在床底下了。

en: He amused us with a funny story.
zh: 他讲了个笑话，把我们逗乐了。

en: He has an endless store of good jokes.
He rescued a boy from drowning.
zh: 他救了一个快淹死的男孩。

en: He wrote the score of the opera.
We cannot find him in the office. He may have quit his job.
zh: 办公室找不到他，他可能辞职了。

en: Tom spends a lot of time at the office.
zh: 汤姆大部分时间都待在办公室里。

en: He was accompanied by his aunt.
He is staying with his aunt.
He boarded with his aunt.
He was born in Ohio.
He gave way to the old lady and let her pass.
zh: 他给那位老太太让路，让她先过去。

en: He cut down the tree with an ax.
zh: 他用斧头砍倒了那棵树。

en: He chopped down the branch with an ax.
He left for America the day before yesterday.
He is a very agreeable person.
He was educated at Oxford.
He has come down in the world.
It is probable that he will fail.
I dare say he will find the right wife for himself.
zh: 我敢说，他肯定能找个好媳妇。

en: He wasn't perhaps playing a practical joke on us.
zh: 他可能不是在跟我们开玩笑。

en: The chances are that he is still in bed.
zh: 估计他这会儿还没起床呢。

en: He thought maybe this was a trick.
zh: 他觉得这没准是个圈套。

en: He warned us to cease talking.
He is a nice man, except that he talks too much.
zh: 他人挺好的，就是话太多。

en: He was brought up by his uncle.
He lived next to his uncle.
He is taken care of by his uncle.
zh: 他一直由他叔叔照顾着。

en: He carried his grandfather on his back.
He told me that his grandfather is over ninety.
zh: 他告诉我他爷爷都九十多岁了。

en: He sent a letter addressed to his uncle.
zh: 他给他叔叔寄了一封信。

en: I think he was angry.
zh: 我觉得他应该是生气了。

en: He read physics at Oxford.
He entered the classroom with his overcoat on.
He took off his overcoat.
He wrapped himself in his overcoat.
zh: 他用大衣把自己裹了起来。

en: He is saving money so that he may buy a motorcycle.
I think he is from Australia, but I'm not sure.
zh: 我觉得他是澳洲来的，但不确定。

en: He was brought up in Australia.
He grew up in Australia.
He is as lean as a wolf.
zh: 他瘦得跟皮包骨头似的。

en: He earns a great deal.
He was put out.
He went straight to a place where good food was served.
zh: 他直奔一家好吃的餐馆去了。

en: He pushed the stalled car with all his might.
zh: 他使劲推着那辆抛锚的车。

en: He left the motor running.
He is liked by Ellen.
He waited for the elevator to come down.
He knows nothing about electronics.
zh: 他对电子产品一窍不通。

en: He was a member of the expedition which climbed Mount Everest.
zh: 他是当年攀登珠峰探险队的一员。

en: He conquered Mt. Everest.
He was the first man that climbed Mount Everest.
zh: 他是第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的人。

en: He is engaged in the study of energy.
zh: 他在搞能源方面的研究。

en: He is an ace pitcher.
He is engaged in the research of AIDS.
He is working in AIDS research.
zh: 他在从事艾滋病研究工作。

en: He married an air hostess.
His face expresses joy.
He cried for joy.
He was so happy he did a little dance.
He seemed to be beside himself with joy.
He is noisy, but otherwise a very nice boy.
zh: 他挺吵的，但人确实不错。

en: He is heavy by nature.
He managed to find a new job successfully.
zh: 他顺利地找到了新工作。

en: He passed the examination.
He cannot sing well.
He succeeded in solving the problem.
He succeeded in solving the question.
He skillfully turned the trouble to his advantage.
zh: 他巧妙地化解了麻烦，并变为了自己的优势。

en: He is eager to succeed.
He tells a good joke.
He gave birth to a brilliant idea.
He had his share of luck.
He is so full of conceit that everybody dislikes him.
zh: 他太自负了，大家都不喜欢他。

en: He lay prostrate, ready to ambush the invaders.
zh: 他趴在地上，准备伏击入侵者。

en: He was sleeping on his face.
He's been friendly with my kid brother.
zh: 他对我弟弟一直挺友好的。

en: Among our employees he's recognized as a towering figure.
zh: 在员工眼里，他可是个了不起的人物。

en: He has come out of his shell.
He is not going to get ahead.
He is above telling lies.
zh: 他为人正直，不屑于撒谎。

en: He lied his way out of it.
He seems to think nothing of telling a lie.
zh: 他好像觉得撒谎没什么大不了。

en: He is ashamed of telling lies.
He disgraced himself by telling a lie.
He seems to be lying.
It seems that he is telling a lie.
He is lying.
He is telling a lie.
He's lying.
The idea occurred to me that he was lying.
He may have told a lie.
He didn't tell a lie. As a matter of fact, he told the whole truth.
zh: 他没撒谎。事实上，他说的全是实话。

en: He made an admission that he had lied.
He is incapable of telling a lie.
He is adept at telling lies.
He turned out to be nothing but a liar.
He is nothing but a liar.
I suspect him to be a liar.
He was looked down on as a liar.
zh: 大家都瞧不起他，觉得他是个骗子。

en: He's a liar, and you're another.
He crouched and went on crying.
He wore a light blue tie.
zh: 他戴着一条浅蓝色的领带。

en: He baited the trap for rabbits.
zh: 他在抓兔子的陷阱里放了饵。

en: He was at the airport to meet Mr West.
zh: 他在机场接韦斯特先生。

en: He is a waiter and an actor.
zh: 他既是服务员也是演员。

en: He is a waiter and also an actor.
zh: 他是个服务员，也是个演员。

en: He wears a wool sweater.
He is wearing a wool sweater.
He cannot tell wool from cotton.
He shows interest in winter sports.
zh: 他对冬季运动挺感兴趣的。

en: He took a drink of whiskey neat.
He drank some beer besides a bottle of whisky.
zh: 除了那一瓶威士忌，他还喝了点啤酒。

en: He drank a shot of whiskey.
He deals in whiskey.
He doesn't even drink beer, not to mention whiskey.
zh: 他连啤酒都不喝，更别说威士忌了。

en: He is very good at playing violin.
He is ill with influenza.
He is at the doctor for influenza.
zh: 他得流感了，正在看医生呢。

en: He put down the rebellion in India.
He taught a group of Indian boys.
He received a good education in England.
zh: 他在英国受过良好的教育。

en: He soiled his white shirt when he changed the ink cartridge.
zh: 他换墨盒的时候把白衬衫弄脏了。

en: He is what we call an honour student.
zh: 他就是我们常说的优等生。

en: He's what we call an honor student.
zh: 他就是我们常说的优等生。

en: He is what is called a bookworm.
zh: 他就是大家说的书呆子。

en: He is what is called a walking encyclopedia.
zh: 他就是所谓的活百科全书。

en: He is what we call a man of culture.
zh: 他就是我们常说的文化人。

en: He is not what is called a genius. Rather, he is a hard worker.
zh: 他算不上天才，其实是靠后天努力的。

en: He is what we call a pioneer.
zh: 他就是我们所说的先驱。

en: He is what is called a champion of justice.
zh: 他就是所谓的正义使者。

en: He is not what is called a gentleman.
He is what we call a bright boy.
zh: 他就是我们常说的聪明孩子。

en: He is what is called a gentleman.
He is what is called a self-made man.
zh: 他就是所谓的白手起家的人。

en: He is a so called liberal.
zh: 他是个所谓的自由主义者。

en: He is what we call the man of the hour.
zh: 他就是我们常说的风云人物。

en: He is what is called a man of action.
He is what is called a man of culture.
He regards so-called compulsory education as useless.
zh: 他觉得所谓的义务教育一点用也没有。

en: He is what we call a scholar.
zh: 他就是我们所说的学者。

en: He is what we call a musical genius.
zh: 他就是我们常说的音乐天才。

en: He is what you call a fine gentleman.
zh: 他就是你们说的那种翩翩君子。

en: He is what is called a pedant.
He is what we call a self-made man.
zh: 他就是我们说的那种白手起家的人。

en: He is not your common doting parent.
zh: 他可不是那种溺爱孩子的普通家长。

en: He is, so to speak, a walking encyclopedia.
zh: 可以说，他就是一部活百科全书。

en: He's what they call a walking encyclopedia.
zh: 他就是大家说的活百科全书。

en: He is a Japanese Edison, as it were.
zh: 可以说，他简直就是日本的爱迪生。

en: He is, so to speak, a grown-up baby.
zh: 这么说吧，他就是个巨婴。

en: He is, as it were, a grown-up baby.
He is a wise fool, so to speak.
zh: 可以说，他是个大智若愚的人。

en: He is, so to speak, a learned fool.
zh: 可以说，他是个满腹经纶的傻瓜。

en: He is, so to speak, a human robot.
zh: 可以说，他就像个机器人一样。

en: He is, so to speak, a star player.
zh: 可以说，他就是个明星球员。

en: He is, so to speak, her servant.
zh: 可以说，他简直就是她的仆人。

en: He became, as it were, a kind of hero from a strange land.
zh: 他成了，怎么说呢，一个来自异乡的英雄。

en: He has various knowledge.
He knows lots.
He got tired of being the devil's advocate and now agrees with every idea they suggest, no matter how dumb.
zh: 他不想再唱反调了，现在不管人家提什么主意他都同意，哪怕再蠢。

en: He has gleaned knowledge from various books.
zh: 他从各种书里汲取了知识。

en: He grew a variety of crops.
zh: 他种了各种各样的庄稼。

en: He gave in up to all kinds of pleasures.
He's had many bad experiences.
zh: 他经历过很多糟糕的事情。

en: He's had many unhappy experiences.
zh: 他经历过很多不顺心的事。

en: He has so many calls on his time, it is very difficult to make an appointment to see him.
zh: 他太忙了，想约见他特别难。

en: He has apple-polished in vain.
He was listening to the radio with his earphone.
zh: 他正戴着耳机听收音机呢。

en: He is an unpleasant fellow.
He went to see her reluctantly.
zh: 他老大不情愿地去见她。

en: He reluctantly went to see her.
He did the work against his will.
zh: 他是不情愿地做了那份工作。

en: He warned his sister about that man.
zh: 他提醒过他妹妹要提防那个男的。

en: He can't chew well, because he has a toothache now.
zh: 他现在牙疼，没法好好嚼东西。

en: He is out now.
He was cut down in his prime.
He's swimming now.
He has been here till now.
He's still sponging off his father.
He still believes her words.
He still cherishes his old car.
zh: 他还宝贝着他那辆旧车呢。

en: He is the greatest man who has ever lived.
zh: 他是有史以来最伟大的人。

en: He is as great a physicist as ever lived.
zh: 他是史上最伟大的物理学家之一。

en: He lives on his country estate.
He was conspicuous by his absence.
zh: 他的缺席反而显得格外引人注目。

en: When does he get back from his trip?
He is getting on with his cousin.
He went to stay with his cousin.
When is he expected back?
When will he be back?
When did he fall ill?
When will he be busy?
He was at a loss when to start.
zh: 他当时不知道该什么时候开始。

en: When did he come back from Osaka?
zh: 他什么时候从大阪回来的？

en: When did he return from Osaka?
zh: 他什么时候从大阪回来的？

en: When did he come of age?
When did he become an adult?
He didn't so much as greet us whenever he met us.
zh: 他每次见到我们，连个招呼都不打。

en: When did he get to Kyoto?
He didn't specify when he would return.
zh: 他没说具体什么时候回来。

en: When did he get back?
When did he come over to see you?
zh: 他什么时候过来看你的？

en: When will he go home?
He is always cool.
When did he go to Europe?
He is always looking for praise.
zh: 他总是想听别人的夸奖。

en: He failed by playing all the time.
zh: 他因为光顾着玩，结果搞砸了。

en: He is always true to his friends.
He was always as good as his word.
He always make good his promises.
He is punctual in keeping appointments.
He makes it a rule to sit up late at night.
He always sits up late at night.
He is always cheerful.
He is always going after fame.
He is always seeking for fame and wealth.
He's always worrying about his daughter.
He is always expressionless.
He always leaves the window open while he sleeps.
He is always looking to the future.
He's always reading comics.
He is always on the go.
He always tells the truth.
He is busy all the time.
He's always busy.
He is always forgetting things.
He is always studying.
He always talks as if he knows everything.
zh: 他说话老是像什么都懂似的。

en: He always keeps his room clean.
zh: 他总是把房间收拾得很干净。

en: He always keeps his room as neat as a pin.
zh: 他总是把房间收拾得一尘不染。

en: He always speaks ill of his father behind his back.
zh: 他老是在背后说他爸的坏话。

en: He is always trying to do the impossible.
zh: 他老是想做那些不可能的事。

en: He is always generous to poor people.
He is always in company with beautiful women.
zh: 他身边总是有美女陪着。

en: He is always finding fault with the work of his secretary.
zh: 他老是挑他秘书工作的毛病。

en: He always speaks well of her.
He always takes sides with her.
He is always upset by her words.
zh: 她的话老是让他不痛快。

en: He is always reading.
He is always isolated from his fellow workers.
He keeps making the same mistake.
He always says the same thing.
He is always kind to animals.
zh: 他对动物总是很有爱心。

en: He usually looks through the newspapers before breakfast.
zh: 他习惯在吃早饭前翻翻报纸。

en: He is always working from morning till night.
He always leaves for work at 8:00 a.m.
zh: 他总是早上八点出门去上班。

en: He always goes to work at 8:00 a.m.
He is not always late.
He doesn't always come late.
He seems to be always in conflict with someone.
zh: 他好像总是在跟人闹矛盾。

en: He has always associated with large enterprises.
zh: 他一直跟大企业有往来。

en: He is always complaining of ill treatment.
He always relies on other people.
He always tries to see the good in others.
He is always ready to find fault with other people.
He is always finding fault with other people.
He always makes a fool of others.
He always makes a ready answer.
zh: 他总是反应很快，对答如流。

en: He is always finding fault with his teacher.
He always spends his money freely.
zh: 他花钱总是大手大脚的。

en: He always wears blue shirts.
He always speaks of the government with contempt.
zh: 他提到政府时总是一脸不屑。

en: He is always at the top of the class.
zh: 他成绩总是班里第一名。

en: He has always had a great curiosity about the world.
zh: 他一直对这个世界充满好奇。

en: He always tries to trip people up.
He is always giving people a lot of trouble.
zh: 他总是给人添不少麻烦。

en: He is always natural with other people.
zh: 他在别人面前总是很随和。

en: He really has it out for people.
He always plans a thing out carefully before he does it.
zh: 他做事之前总会仔细计划好。

en: He's always complaining about the food.
zh: 他老是抱怨伙食不好吃。

en: He is always joking.
He is always at odds with his boss.
He is always partial to the company of girls.
zh: 他总是喜欢往女生堆里钻。

en: He always stays in bed as late as he can.
zh: 他总是赖床，能赖多久就赖多久。

en: He's always late for class.
He is always harassed with debts.
He always leaves home at seven.
He always puts himself first.
He always shows off his abilities.
zh: 他总是爱显摆自己的本事。

en: He is always boasting of his achievements.
zh: 他老是吹嘘自己的成就。

en: He always persisted in his errors.
He is always vague about his intentions.
zh: 他的意图总是模棱两可。

en: He always insisted that he was in the right.
zh: 他总坚持说自己是对的。

en: He is always punctual.
He always mistakes me for my sister.
zh: 他总是把我错认成我姐。

en: He is always making a fool of me.
He always invited me to his dinner parties.
zh: 他总是请我去参加他的饭局。

en: He gives me a bad time, as he always does.
zh: 他还是像往常一样让我不好过。

en: He usually drops in at my place.
zh: 他经常顺便来我这儿坐坐。

en: He is always on my side.
He is always finding fault with me.
He is always complaining about the way I do things.
zh: 他老是抱怨我做事的方式。

en: He always behaved badly to me.
He always imposes his opinion on me.
zh: 他总爱把自己的意见强加给我。

en: He always makes cynical remarks to me.
zh: 他老是跟我说些冷嘲热讽的话。

en: He is always friendly to me.
He is always with me.
He's always breaking into our conversation.
He's always trying to say something to us.
zh: 他总想跟我们说点什么。

en: He is always yelling at his children.
zh: 他老是冲孩子们大喊大叫。

en: He always leaves his work half done.
He always works with all his might.
zh: 他干活儿总是拼尽全力。

en: He always hums while working.
zh: 他干活的时候总爱哼着小曲儿。

en: He is always behind time with his work.
zh: 他工作老是赶不上进度。

en: I wish I was always being sent abroad on business like he is.
zh: 真希望我也能像他那样经常被派去国外出差。

en: He is always losing his umbrella.
He always reads a magazine.
zh: 他总是拿着本杂志在看。

en: He always quarrels with his wife.
He always troubles himself about minor things.
zh: 他老是为些芝麻绿豆的小事操心。

en: He is always happy.
He always speaks at random.
He always wears heavy clothes.
He always talks as though he were addressing a public meeting.
zh: 他说话总像是在作报告。

en: He is not always in the office in the morning.
zh: 他上午不一定总在办公室。

en: He always gets home at six o'clock in the evening.
He always gets home at 6:00 p.m.
He's always running short of cash.
He always teaches from notes.
He always possesses good health.
He is always at home on Mondays.
On Mondays, he's always at home.
He's always at home on Mondays.
He's always looking at you. He must love you.
zh: 他老盯着你看，肯定很爱你。

en: He's always looking at you.
He is always pressed for money.
He is always day-dreaming.
He is always willing to help others.
He is always full of vigor.
He always wears his school tie.
He is always late for school.
He's always late for school.
He is always seeking pleasure.
He always tries to have his own way.
zh: 他总是想按自己的意思来。

en: He is always dwelling on the pleasures of the past.
He always takes his time in everything he does.
zh: 他做事总是不紧不慢的。

en: He complains about one thing or another all the time.
zh: 他总是没完没了地抱怨。

en: He is forever complaining about something.
He has always devoted himself to music.
zh: 他一直全身心投入在音乐里。

en: He always values his wife's opinions.
zh: 环境他总是很看重他老婆的意见。

en: He is always speaking ill of his wife.
He's always saying bad things about his wife.
zh: 他老是说他老婆的坏话。

en: He's always bad-mouthing his wife.
zh: 他老是背后编排他老婆。

en: He always parades his knowledge of English.
zh: 他老爱显摆自己的英语。

en: He's always anxious to pick up gossip.
He always works hard.
He always studies hard.
He always says one word too many.
He always passes for a great scholar.
zh: 他老是被当成大学问家。

en: He worked harder than ever.
zh: 他干得比以前更卖力了。

en: He always walks with a rifle.
As he had worked longer than usual, he felt tired.
zh: 因为干活比平时久，他觉得挺累的。

en: Since he had worked longer than usual, he felt tired.
zh: 因为干活时间比平时长，他感到累了。

en: He felt tired because he had worked longer than usual.
zh: 他觉得累是因为干活比平时久。

en: He came home later than usual.
He arrived earlier than usual.
He got up earlier than usual.
He is always up to no good.
He always plays well.
He always speaks from notes.
He always takes notes.
He always takes note of his boss's movements.
zh: 他老是留意老板的一举一动。

en: He is constantly complaining.
He is always up and doing.
He's always asking silly questions.
He came late as usual.
zh: 他还是跟平时一样迟到了。

en: He scratched his head out of habit.
He gave his sudden, goblin like grin.
zh: 他突然露出了那种怪怪的坏笑。

en: Don't fall for his old tricks.
He arrived late as usual.
zh: 他跟平时一样，又来晚了。

en: He started talking about his ideals as usual.
zh: 他又像往常一样开始聊他的理想了。

en: He got up at five as usual.
zh: 他还是跟平时一样五点就起床了。

en: He went to bed at ten as usual.
zh: 他还是跟往常一样十点睡觉。

en: He is as healthy as ever.
zh: 他的身体还是跟以前一样好。

en: He is always as busy as a bee.
He always seems to be living rent-free in somebody's house.
zh: 他好像总是白住在别人家里。

en: He always tells at random.
He always worries about minor points.
zh: 他总是纠结那些细枝末节。

en: That is how he always treats me.
zh: 他一直以来就是这么对我的。

en: He is always in a fidget.
It is always the case with him.
He always takes his coffee strong.
zh: 他喝咖啡总是喜欢喝浓的。

en: He's always short of money.
He is always asking for money.
He is always throwing his weight around.
He is always full of ideas.
He is always complaining of this and that.
zh: 他总是抱怨这抱怨那的。

en: He is always finding fault.
He was always finding fault with me.
He usually gets up at six.
He will love her forever.
He never loses his curiosity; he is, as it were, an eternal youth.
zh: 他的好奇心一点没减，简直像个永葆青春的少年。

en: He kept on crying.
He usually takes a walk, book in hand.
zh: 他通常拿本书一边走一边看。

en: He always wants to have his own way.
zh: 他总是想怎么着就怎么着。

en: He always treats me like a child.
He always makes sure to come on time.
He makes mistakes every time he speaks English.
He is a constant torment to me.
How is it that he solved the problem?
zh: 他是怎么把那问题给解决了的？

en: He is a man hard to get on with.
He left everything to chance.
zh: 他把一切都交给了运气。

en: When did he come here?
He will return to Japan some day.
zh: 他总有一天会回日本的。

en: When did he arrive here?
He will come to see us some day.
I believe he is going to be rich one day.
zh: 我相信他总有一天会发财的。

en: He will be a Washington someday.
zh: 他将来会成为像华盛顿那样的人物。

en: Will he ever come back?
He told me when to say yes.
zh: 他告诉了我什么时候该答应。

en: He wants to be an Edison some day.
zh: 他想以后成为像爱迪生那样的发明家。

en: He picked out the best book.
He's been awarded a gold medal once.
He has a basket full of strawberries.
He is an Italian.
He was born in a small town in Italy.
zh: 他出生在意大利的一个小镇。

en: He told me that he was going to Italy.
zh: 他跟我说他要去意大利。

en: He carried on the restaurant in Italy for many years.
zh: 他在意大利经营那家餐厅很多年了。

en: He cut down the tree for fun.
zh: 他砍掉那棵树纯粹是为了好玩。

en: He must have done it out of mischief.
zh: 他肯定是因为调皮才这么干的。

en: He likes to be mischievous.
He has not gotten in touch with me for a long time under the pretence of being busy.
zh: 他老拿忙当借口，好久没跟我联系了。

en: He is leaning on the back of the chair.
He stood behind the chair.
He wriggled his way through the chairs.
zh: 他在椅子中间钻来钻去的。

en: He settled himself in a chair.
He sank into a chair.
zh: 他一屁股坐进了椅子里。

en: He rose from his chair to welcome me.
zh: 他从椅子上站起来迎接我。

en: In an emergency he had nothing to fall back upon.
zh: 遇到急事时，他一点依靠都没有。

en: He is the last person to leave you in time of need.
zh: 在你有难的时候，他绝对不会丢下你不管。

en: He is rather hard to please.
He would be the last person to leave you in time of need.
zh: 他是那种最不可能在你有难处时离开你的人。

en: He is a bad boy.
He can come up with any amount of money.
zh: 多少钱他都能拿得出来。

en: He collected bits of information.
zh: 他收集了一些零星的信息。

en: He is on the heavy side.
How many does he want?
He is eminent for his great discoveries.
zh: 他因为那些伟大的发现而很有名。

en: He made several corrections.
He differs from me in some ways.
zh: 他有些地方跟我不太一样。

en: He collected various information.
zh: 他收集了各种各样的信息。

en: He wrote several plays in verse.
He owns several hotels. In a word, he is a multimillionaire.
zh: 他有好几家酒店。一句话，他是个千万富翁。

en: He is well read in English literature.
He comes from England, but is very poor at English.
zh: 他是从英国来的，但英语说得很烂。

en: He pretended to be an Englishman, but his foreign accent gave him away.
zh: 他冒充英国人，但口音让他露馅了。

en: He's an Englishman, and, I guess, has known better days.
zh: 他是个英国人，我觉得他以前肯定风光过。

en: He comes from England.
He crossed over to England.
He is the only American who has swum the English Channel.
zh: 他是唯一游过英吉利海峡的美国人。

en: He is determined to go to England.
He has gone to Britain.
He has been to England twice.
It seems to me that he is from England.
He is not an English boy.
He was in his home in Cambridge, England.
zh: 他当时在英国剑桥的家里。

en: He seems to live in Britain.
It is said that he is in Britain.
Although he was born in England, he speaks English very badly.
zh: 虽然他生在英国，但英语讲得很烂。

en: He was born in England, but was educated in America.
zh: 他出生在英国，但在美国受的教育。

en: He told of his adventures with animation.
zh: 他绘声绘色地讲着他的冒险故事。

en: He must have lost his marbles.
He looks stern.
He speaks as if he had studied abroad.
zh: 他说话的样子好像留过学似的。

en: He posed as my close friend.
zh: 他装得像是我铁哥们儿一样。

en: He's a salesman's salesman.
zh: 他是推销员里的顶尖高手。

en: He is never discouraged, no matter what difficulties he may face.
zh: 无论遇到什么困难，他都从不气馁。

en: He is never discouraged, no matter what difficulty he may face.
zh: 无论面临什么样的困难，他都不会灰心。

en: He is mixed up with something shabby.
zh: 他卷进了一些见不得人的勾当。

en: I don't think he'll say yes.
He seems to be a nice fellow.
He seems to be a nice guy.
He seems to be a good guy.
He won't be a good player.
He will be a good teacher.
He seems like a good person.
He took great pains to do a good job.
zh: 为了把工作做好，他费了不少心思。

en: He earns a good salary.
I believe he is a nice guy.
He is a good fellow.
He checked in at a good hotel.
zh: 他住进了一家挺高级的酒店。

en: He's a good kid - very quick on the uptake and he does whatever needs to be done.
zh: 这孩子挺不错的，反应快，活儿也勤快。

en: At best he may take third place.
zh: 他充其量也就拿个第三名。

en: He will make a good team captain.
He never did his work anyhow.
He is not a man to trifle with.
He appears to know Ann.
He ran so fast that he was out of breath.
zh: 他跑得飞快，都上气不接下气了。

en: He isn't quite a gentleman.
Since he can read such tiny print, he is far from being near-sighted.
zh: 他连这么小的字都能看清，肯定不是近视眼。

en: He wasn't happy in spite of all his wealth.
zh: 尽管很有钱，但他过得并不快乐。

en: I wonder if he can live on such a small salary.
zh: 我在想，靠这点工资他能过下去吗？

en: He ought to know better than to quarrel with such a fellow.
zh: 他不该糊涂到去跟那种人吵架。

en: He was rebuked for writing such a rough report.
zh: 他因为报告写得太草率被训了一顿。

en: He is ashamed of having behaved so badly.
zh: 他为自己表现得这么差感到很羞愧。

en: He is very much ashamed of having behaved so badly.
zh: 他为自己刚才那么失礼的行为感到非常羞愧。

en: If he had not died so young, he would have become a great scientist.
zh: 要不是英年早逝，他本可以成为一名伟大的科学家。

en: He wants whipping for saying that.
He has been keeping company with Ann for three months.
He married Ann.
He liked Ann, but then his parents didn't.
zh: 他挺喜欢安的，可他父母不喜欢。

en: He claims that he is a painter.
He is none the wiser for all his experiences.
zh: 经历了这么多，他还是没长半点记性。

en: He is torn by doubts.
zh: 他深陷怀疑，内心非常纠结。

en: He wrote a biography of a famous poet.
zh: 他给一位著名的诗人写了传记。

en: He bought eggs and milk from a farmer.
zh: 他从一个农民那儿买了鸡蛋和牛奶。

en: He is clever in some ways.
zh: 他在某些方面挺聪明的。

en: He says he has achieved his goal to a certain extent.
zh: 他说他在一定程度上已经达成了目标。

en: You can trust him to some degree but not wholly.
zh: 你可以在一定程度上相信他，但不能全信。

en: He left Japan on a fine day.
zh: 他在一个晴朗的日子离开了日本。

en: He was tormented by some deep sorrow.
zh: 他被一种深沉的悲哀折磨着。

en: He had a certain charm.
He bought an English book at a bookstore.
zh: 他在书店买了一本英文书。

en: He worked for a rich man.
zh: 他在一个有钱人家里干活。

en: He keeps company with a foreign student.
zh: 他正跟一个留学生交往。

en: He is right in a sense.
zh: 从某种意义上来说，他是对的。

en: He is in a sense a representative of his company.
zh: 从某种意义上说，他是公司的代表。

en: He is an artist in a sense.
zh: 从某种意义上说，他算是个艺术家。

en: He is a genius in a sense.
zh: 从某种意义上说，他是个天才。

en: He had the honor of being presented to a great writer.
zh: 他有幸被引荐给了一位伟大的作家。

en: He stood dazedly watching the beauty of the Alpine dawn.
zh: 他愣在那儿，看着阿尔卑斯山的黎明美景。

en: He cannot so much as write the alphabet.
He is rarely, if ever, late for appointments.
He never drinks alcohol.
He is threatened by a certain gangster.
zh: 他受到某个歹徒的威胁。

en: He's being threatened by a certain gangster.
zh: 他正受到一个流氓的威胁。

en: He has enough and to spare of money.
He tried to get rid of the ants.
zh: 他想方设法除掉那些蚂蚁。

en: He has shot some Westerns in Arizona.
zh: 他在亚利桑那州拍了几部西部片。

en: He is infatuated with Alice.
He had enough and to spare.
zh: 他拥有的东西绰绰有余。

en: He had more than enough money.
He is a genius at nitpicking.
zh: 他在挑刺儿方面真是个天才。

en: He thinks of everything in terms of profit.
He rejected all the objections.
zh: 他驳回了所有的反对意见。

en: He is a politician in all senses.
zh: 他是个彻头彻尾的政客。

en: He is inferior to you in all respects.
He succeeded in spite of all the lifetimes.
zh: 尽管历经波折，他还是成功了。

en: He succeeded in spite of all difficulties.
zh: 尽管困难重重，他还是成功了。

en: He has all kinds of books.
He knows all manner of animals.
zh: 他认识各种各样的动物。

en: He could get over every difficulty.
He used every chance to practice English.
zh: 他利用每一个机会练习英语。

en: He took advantage of every opportunity he had.
zh: 他利用了能得到的每一个机会。

en: He was bereft of all hope.
He's at home in all the sciences.
zh: 他在各个科学领域都很在行。

en: He is respectable in every way.
He came near to being drowned in the river.
He was nearly run over at a crossing.
zh: 他在路口差点被车撞了。

en: He was nearly run over at an intersection.
zh: 他在十字路口差点被车撞了。

en: He was nearly drowned.
He went to America for the purpose of studying American literature.
zh: 他去美国是为了研究美国文学。

en: He went to America to study American literature.
zh: 他去美国学美国文学了。

en: He is one of the American presidential candidates.
zh: 他是美国总统候选人之一。

en: He is a diplomat at the American Embassy.
zh: 他是美国大使馆的外交官。

en: He has access to the American Embassy.
zh: 他有权进入美国大使馆。

en: He started to tell us his experiences during his stay in America. We were all ears.
zh: 他开始讲他在美国的经历了，我们都洗耳恭听。

en: He is not an American but a Frenchman.
zh: 他不是美国人，而是法国人。

en: He is not an American but an Englishman.
zh: 他不是美国人，而是英国人。

en: He is not an American.
He is an American.
He is American.
He is an American, but as he was born and brought up in Japan, he can speak Japanese quite fluently.
zh: 他是美国人，但因为在日本出生长大，他日语说得很流利。

en: He was reading a textbook on American history.
zh: 他在读一本美国历史教科书。

en: He availed himself of the first chance to visit America.
zh: 他一有机会就去美国了。
